hero.title: BiblioKit
hero.subtitle: SaaS Software & Figma Plugins
hero.description: Professional SaaS software and Figma plugins with secure API management, comprehensive documentation, and world-class support for designers and developers.

features.title: Secure API Management
features.description: Generate, manage, and secure your API keys with enterprise-grade security, rate limiting, and comprehensive usage tracking.

features.title: Figma Plugin Proxy
features.description: Secure OpenAI API proxy for Figma plugins with CORS protection, request validation, and automatic rate limiting.

features.title: Help Desk System
features.description: Professional support ticket system with real-time messaging, priority management, and comprehensive admin dashboard.

features.title: Developer-First
features.description: Comprehensive API documentation, code examples, and SDKs to get you up and running in minutes.

features.title: Premium Support
features.description: 24/7 expert support with guaranteed response times and dedicated account management for enterprise customers.

features.title: Production Ready
features.description: Built for scale with monitoring, logging, error tracking, and automatic failover for 99.9% uptime.

features.title: AI Rename Variants
features.description: Instantly relabel Figma variant and layer names with context-aware AI. Remove clutter and bring order to your files in seconds.

features.title: Component Auditor
features.description: Audit Figma components for naming, structure, and missing variants. Boost design quality with actionable insights.

features.title: BiblioKit Blocks
features.description: Professional design system analytics platform that tracks Figma component usage, measures ROI, and optimizes component libraries for product teams.

features.title: UXBiblio
features.description: Discover curated UI/UX patterns, templates, and best practices. Accelerate interface design with an ever-expanding pattern library.

pricing.name: Free
pricing.description: Perfect for getting started with BiblioKit

pricing.name: Enterprise
pricing.description: For large organizations with custom needs

product.title: BiblioKit Blocks
product.description: Professional design system analytics platform that tracks Figma component usage, measures design system ROI, and optimizes component libraries with automated insights for product teams.

details.title: Automated Figma Integration
details.description: Connect via secure OAuth to automatically track component usage across all your design libraries and files in real-time

details.title: Visual Analytics Dashboard
details.description: Interactive charts showing usage trends, adoption rates, and performance metrics with exportable reports and insights

details.title: Component Performance Insights
details.description: Identify over-used, under-used, and unused components instantly with detailed breakdowns and recommendations

details.title: ROI Reporting & Metrics
details.description: Generate executive reports demonstrating design system business impact with quantifiable time savings and efficiency gains

details.title: Team Collaboration Analytics
details.description: Multi-user access with role-based permissions, shared dashboards, and collaborative insights for entire product teams

benefits: Increase design system adoption by 25%+ with usage visibility
Reduce component maintenance overhead by 30% through data-driven decisions
Demonstrate ROI with quantifiable time savings and efficiency metrics
Optimize team productivity with 20-40% faster feature development cycles
Achieve 85%+ component reuse rates across projects
Make informed decisions about component deprecation and optimization

specifications.name: Analytics Engine
specifications.value: Real-time component tracking across unlimited files

specifications.name: Figma Integration
specifications.value: Secure OAuth connection with automatic sync

specifications.name: Export Options
specifications.value: CSV, PDF reports, and shareable links

pricing.description: Professional design system analytics for growing product teams. 14-day free trial included.
